jobDescription: We are looking for a graduate student to work in a data scientist training position. Required skills are: Strong programming skillA firm grasp of Statistics and Probability Experience with Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3), statistical data analysis, sentiment analysis, machine learning, etc is considered a plus.  Applicants should send along a CV (preferably including course work & grades) + examples of their work (if any - e.g. a github account.)SDL2017
